title: Pregnant Dylan Dreyer celebrates her seventh anniversary with sparkling cider
text:
Dylan Dreyer and her husband Brian Fichera popped some bubbly in honor of their seventh wedding anniversary — though the pregnant meteorologist had to settle for sparkling apple cider.

The 38-year-old Today star, who is expecting her second child this winter, took to Instagram on Sunday to share a photo of herself holding up her Martinelli's sparkling cider while Brian showed off his bottle of Veuve Clicquot Champagne.

'Toasting to our 7th Anniversary!! @fishlense the joy you bring me is indescribable...thank you for being you and all you do. I love you!' she captioned the sweet selfie, which shows them both smiling from ear to ear for the camera.

Milestone: Dylan Dreyer and her husband Brian Fichera celebrated their anniversary over the weekend. The pregnant Today star had sparking cider while Brian enjoyed champagne

Date night: The two enjoyed a pizza date before seeing Moulin Rouge! The Musical on Broadway in honor of seven years of marriage

Brian, a cameraman at NBC News, also shared pictures from their anniversary celebration, which included pizza and Moulin Rouge! The Musical.

In the first snapshot, Dylan is eating her slice of pizza, while the following image is a picture of the stage at the Broadway show.

The final snapshot shows an open notebook where they keep a running score of their rummy games along with specific memories.

Celebration: Brian snapped a picture of the stage before the show started

Aww: Later that night, they rented a hotel room and played rummy. Brian revealed they keep a journal with a running score of their games along with memories specific memories

'Yesterday me and my best friend went to dinner and a show. Two plain slices and two tickets. It was in celebration of 7 years of an impossibly fulfilling and amazing marriage,' he wrote.

'We had our pizza, saw our show, got a hotel room in the city for the night and played cards. Specifically we played our "forever" game of rummy,' he explained.

'We keep a running score in our little book that’s also filled with little journal entry’s [sic] of where we are in our lives at that particular moment.

'Here’s to the book never closing...7 years of being married to my best friend....and me closing the score to within 100. #happyanniversary.'

Growing family: Dylan and Brian have a two-year-old son Calvin and a second baby on the way

Due date: Dylan, pictured with her Today co-star Al Roker, is expecting a baby boy in January

It's been a year of highs and lows for the couple, who suffered a heartbreaking first-trimester miscarriage last winter while trying to give their two-year-old son a sibling.

Dylan and Brian candidly opened up about their struggles with secondary infertility, and they were ready to turn to in vitro fertilization to help conceive another child.

Right before they started the IVF process, they learned Dylan had gotten pregnant naturally, despite her infertility struggles.

The couple announced in July that they are expecting their second child, a baby boy who is due in January.
